类的使用
zhao.algorithmMagic.integrator.Route2DDrawingIntegrator

  • 使用Route2DDrawingIntegrator的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    zhao.algorithmMagic.algorithm.generatingAlgorithm  
    zhao.algorithmMagic.integrator  
    zhao.algorithmMagic.integrator.launcher  
    zhao.algorithmMagic.operands.coordinateNet  

    • zhao.algorithmMagic.algorithm.generatingAlgorithm中Route2DDrawingIntegrator的使用

      参数类型为Route2DDrawingIntegrator的zhao.algorithmMagic.algorithm.generatingAlgorithm中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void ZhaoCoordinateNet2D.AdditionalTasks1(Graphics2D graphics2D, Route2DDrawingIntegrator route2DDrawingIntegrator)
      附加任务函数执行题,为了弥补绘图器不够灵活的缺陷,2022年10月16日新增了一个附加任务接口,该接口将会在旧接口的任务执行之前调用 Additional task function execution question, in order to make up for the inflexibility of the plotter, an additional task interface was added on October 16, 2022, which will be called before the task execution of the old interface
      void ZhaoCoordinateNet2D.AdditionalTasks2(Graphics2D graphics2D, Route2DDrawingIntegrator route2DDrawingIntegrator)
      附加任务函数执行题,为了弥补绘图器不够灵活的缺陷,2022年10月16日新增了一个附加任务接口,该接口将会在旧接口的任务执行完调用.

    • zhao.algorithmMagic.integrator中Route2DDrawingIntegrator的使用

      返回Route2DDrawingIntegrator的zhao.algorithmMagic.integrator中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Route2DDrawingIntegrator Route2DDrawingIntegrator.expand() 
      Route2DDrawingIntegrator Route2DDrawingIntegrator.setDiscreteThreshold(int discreteThreshold)
      设置离散阈值,该阈值越大,路线显示越清晰,该阈值可以扩大整个2维空间的显示,默认是 1 Set the discrete threshold, the larger the threshold, the clearer the route display, the threshold can extend the display of the entire 2-dimensional space, the default is 1
      Route2DDrawingIntegrator Route2DDrawingIntegrator.setImageHeight(int imageHeight)
      设置集成器输出图片的高度
      Route2DDrawingIntegrator Route2DDrawingIntegrator.setImageOutPath(String imageOutPath)
      设置图片输出路径.
      Route2DDrawingIntegrator Route2DDrawingIntegrator.setImageWidth(int imageWidth)
      设置集成器输出图片的宽度

      参数类型为Route2DDrawingIntegrator的zhao.algorithmMagic.integrator.launcher中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Route2DDrawingLauncher2.AdditionalTasks1(Graphics2D graphics2D, Route2DDrawingIntegrator route2DDrawingIntegrator)
      附加任务函数执行题,为了弥补绘图器不够灵活的缺陷,2022年10月16日新增了一个附加任务接口,该接口将会在旧接口的任务执行之前调用 Additional task function execution question, in order to make up for the inflexibility of the plotter, an additional task interface was added on October 16, 2022, which will be called before the task execution of the old interface
      void Route2DDrawingLauncher2.AdditionalTasks2(Graphics2D graphics2D, Route2DDrawingIntegrator route2DDrawingIntegrator)
      附加任务函数执行题,为了弥补绘图器不够灵活的缺陷,2022年10月16日新增了一个附加任务接口,该接口将会在旧接口的任务执行完调用.

      附加任务函数执行题,为了弥补绘图器不够灵活的缺陷,2022年10月16日新增了一个附加任务接口,该接口将会在旧接口的任务执行完调用.
